items.sentence: Tom tried to tell me something, but Mary interrupted before he could say anything.
Tom hurt his left knee during practice, so John had to play the game in his place.
Tom played a waltz on the piano using only his thumbs and Mary was very impressed.
It appears that the victim tried to write the murderer\'s name with his own blood.
Tom received a commendation for bravery for rescuing a woman from a burning house.
Tom was hanging out with a bunch of other boys, most of them a bit older than him.
Tom added his own name to the list of people who wanted to take part in the dance.
Tom and Mary are planning to have a house built after they have their first child.
Tom and Mary talked about everything they wanted to do on their upcoming vacation.
Tom entered the empty room and immediately noticed a lit cigarette in the ashtray.
